name: Heavystrong Style
text: At the beginning of the Duel, add 1 "Superheavy Samurai Big Benkei" to your Deck. Can be used once per Duel if you control 2 or more monsters in Defense Position and their total amount of DEF is 3500 or above. Add 1 "Superheavy Samurai Big Benkei" from your Graveyard to your hand. Then, if you do not control a monster whose original DEF is 3500 or more, return 1 card in your hand to your Deck.
